You have 30 points to spend on stats, max of 15 on each.
Affects Damage dealt by melee attacks

get amoount to increase strength from player
check amount entered is less or equal to points left
max to spend at once is 15
check if amount add to str would be greater than 25
total is more than 25 go back to strength
spent more than 15 points back to strength spending

get points to add to stamina from player
player selection is <= points left and <= 15
new stamina to big jump back to start stamina

Affects damage of spells you cast magical damage.
How many points to add to Intelligence[Max: 15]?
get points to add to int from playrer
points select <= points left to spend and <= 15
points selected not <= 15 or <= points left
Affects chance to cast spells and cost of spells
How many points to add to Wisdom[Max: 15]?
get points to spend from player
check points selected <= 15 and points left
Affects chance to steal and damage from range attacks.
How many points to add to Agility[Max: 15]?
get points to add from player
affects cost of non spell items and stealing
How many points to add to Luck[Max: 15]?
get points to add from player
check player input <= 15 and <= points left to spend
points left to spend back to start
Hail, Noble one! Our land is in need of a
salwart hero, one who will brave perils to
horrific to consider. A plauge has befallen
the Realm, a scourage is upon the
Our villages lie sacked, ruinous mounds of
ashes, where once trod peasants stout of heart
and sound of mind, where once lay fields of
where kine and fowl grew fat on the bounties
of our fair Sosoria.   All maner of wicked and
vile creatures prey upon our people and
Tis the the doing of one so evil that the
earth trembles at the very mention o hos name.
He has wrought his mallice well.  Our nobles
bicker amongst themselves.  Aid us in riding
our land in the scourage that has befallen us.
This is a fan made project to recreate Ultima 1
The First Age of Darkness by Origin in RPG Maker MZ

While facing or on top of vehilce press Space Bar
To interact with a character simply walk into them, while
To interact with an object also walk into them. Combat mode
To enter Combat mode press Shift Key
Atack: while in combat mode simply walk into a character or
monster to attack with eaiter a melee weapon or ranged
If you have a ranged weapon you can also Press
A key to fire in the direction you are facing.
If you are on a vehicle with a weapon press the F key.
click on the menu button in the top right corner.
To access the game menu press the M key.
If you are in a location that you can steal from press the
S key.  Can also be done through gsme menu.
Sometimes you are allowed to take items.  If so, while in
the correct location press the G key.  Can also be done
To see the quest log press the Q key.  Can also be accessed
